name: GameD'état Android
description: There are a lot of rts games where you grow an empire, build a huge army and fight your way through forces in search of strenght. This is not a game about such an empire. this game is about destroying them. Gamed'etat is a game about running successful coup to protect and foster your authority. This game will put you in the shoes of Gen. Edward. Head of R.E.I.G.N. and learn about political divisions as you cheat, lie and wage wars to protect what is most valuable to you.
